participant_1.background:
My weekends are for relaxing and spending time with my family.
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
I'm struggling with my parents' distance, but I'm doing well in school.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I curl up with a good book and my pets.
i love to sleep in.
i love meat.
I walk through my new mansion and admire all the places where I can use my power tools to make it even better.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Hey! I'm great! Thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just got back from a trip to Japan.
Oh, that's awesome! How was it? I've always wanted to go to Japan.
It was amazing! The culture is so different from here, but it was really interesting to experience.
I bet! I love learning about new cultures. I've been practicing bird calls lately, even though I'm not very good at it.
That's really cool! I love bird watching! What kind of birds do you like to watch?
I love watching all kinds of birds, but I'm especially fond of hawks and eagles.
Those are great birds! I've seen a few hawks around my neighborhood.
I love how majestic they are!
Yeah, they're really impressive birds. What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to curl up with a good book and my pets. I also love to sleep in. I'm not sure why, but I just love sleeping.
I love sleeping too! I think it's the best way to relax.
I agree! It's so nice to just close your eyes and let the world melt away.
